# ID Conversion {id-conv}

## ID Conversion with `biomaRt`

```{r}
library(biomaRt)

mart <- useMart(biomart = "ENSEMBL_MART_ENSEMBL",
                dataset = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl")

View(listAttributes(mart))

ENTREZ2PFAM <- getBM(filters = "entrezgene_id",
                  attributes = c("entrezgene_id", 
                                 "pfam"),
                  values = all_genes,
                  mart = mart)
```
